properties:
配置数据导入的sql
INSERT INTO `cityperson` (`rowNo`, `shebao_org`, `person_no`, `name`, `cert_type`, `cert_no`, `zhs_item`, `zhs_class`, `zhs_sub_class`, `zhs_year`, `zhs_level`) VALUES (#[rowNo], #[shebao_org], #[person_no], #[name], #[cert_type], #[cert_no], #[zhs_item], #[zhs_class], #[zhs_sub_class], #[zhs_year], #[zhs_level])
INSERT INTO `newmanrequests` (`rowNo`, `shebao_org`, `person_no`, `name`, `cert_type`, `cert_no`, `zhs_item`, `zhs_class`, `zhs_sub_class`, `zhs_year`, `zhs_level`) VALUES (#[rowNo], #[shebao_org], #[person_no], #[name], #[cert_type], #[cert_no], #[zhs_item], #[zhs_class], #[zhs_sub_class], #[zhs_year], #[zhs_level])
INSERT INTO `newmanrequests2` (`rowNo`, `shebao_org`, `person_no`, `name`, `by_year`, `cert_type`, `cert_no`, `zhs_item`, `zhs_class`, `zhs_sub_class`, `zhs_year`, `zhs_level`) VALUES (#[rowNo], #[shebao_org], #[person_no], #[name], #[by_year], #[cert_type], #[cert_no], #[zhs_item], #[zhs_class], #[zhs_sub_class], #[zhs_year], #[zhs_level])
INSERT INTO person_year (rowNo, cert_no, name, sex, by_year, person_type) VALUES (#[rowNo], #[cert_no], #[name], #[sex], #[by_year], #[person_type]);
INSERT INTO person_year (rowNo, cert_no, name, sex, by_year, person_type) VALUES (0, '', '', '', '', '');
select * from newmanrequests2 order by rowNo asc
